name: The Board of Power
description:
The Board of Power is a strategic board game that combines elements of checkers with dynamic gameplay. In this game, players take turns moving their units across the board with the goal of defeating their opponent's units. 

However, what sets this game apart from traditional checkers is the ever-changing power levels of the units as they move across the board. This adds an extra layer of strategy and unpredictability, making each game unique and challenging. 

So, get ready to test your strategic skills and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate Board of Power champion.

There are 2 modes available in the game: Single player and Hot seat.
